definitions: (originally in stories by J. R. R. Tolkien) a member of an imaginary race of small people

examples.text: Bilbo Baggins lived until age 131, making him the second oldest halfling of all time

shortDefinitions: member of race of small people

definitions: (in fantasy fiction) a being who is the offspring of a human and a member of another race

examples.text: sometimes Ana wondered whether he might be a halfling like her, with a human father and elf mother

shortDefinitions: being who is offspring of human and member of another race

definitions: a person who is not yet fully grown

examples.text: in this service he remained until he was nineteen, still serving in the capacity of halfling, with only a halfling's fee

shortDefinitions: person who is not yet fully grown
